name: Pale Sand, Dark Skies
description:
○o｡...................................................................................................｡o○

Waking up after a storm, you are excited to go to the nearby beach and see if anything interesting has washed up. Storms bring many strange things.

○o｡.................................................................................................｡o○

Pale Sand, Dark Skies is a short, chill mostly kinetic novel about a beachcomber coming across some ghost friends, there are two routes each with one ending! Slight tw: Death mention

You can find more of my work HERE and if you want to support what I do check out my patreon!

Thank you, please enjoy! ♡♡♡

Credits

Art+Story: ZeddyBear

 Made with Tyranobuilder!
